name: Plagiarism Checker By SST
author: Small Seo Tools

sections.description:
SmallSEOTools Plagiarism Checker Plugin examines the text on your website and reports if it finds some plagiarized content there. You can try free online Plagiarism Checker plugin for free to check plagiarism or buy one of our premium plans.
The biggest concern for any blogger is to make sure that the content they are going to publish is unique or if it’s already published on the internet. Our plagiarism detector plugin will solve your problem.

Key features

Key features of WordPress Plagiarism Checker Plugin by SmallSEOTools include:

  • Check plagiarism for Duplicated / Plagiarized content on one click.
  • Sentence wise checking.
  • You can also check your old posts.
  • Exclude URL for a blog/website.
  • Quality and reliable plagiarism checking
  • Premium plans with bundles of search queries
  • Checks Each & Every Sentence For Premium Users.
  • How it works check a demo here Plagiarism Checker

For Any help, please contact us.
sections.installation:
You can use the built in installer and upgrading feature, or you can install the plugin manually.

  1. You can use the built-in installer and upgrading feature, or you can install the plugin manually.
  2. You can either use the automatic plugin installer or your FTP program to upload it to your wp-content/plugins directory the top-level folder. Don’t just upload all the PHP files and put them in /wp-content/plugins/.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Visit your Options Page to check plugin status.
  5. Configure any options as desired, and then enable the plugin.
  6. That’s it!

After Installation, create an account at SmallSEOTools.com to get API key for your WordPress plugin and put that API key on the plugin settings page.
